thread.section_title: Apostrophe Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant!
thread.title_full: Brilliant! - Review of Apostrophe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bruce T
title: Brilliant!
text:
Had the best time here. Surprised my girlfriend and they did everything to make it perfect. Petals on the bed etc.
Room was a Balneo Paris Paradis. Once again just perfect. Loved the jacuzzi bath and the fact that it was in the room. Overlooked the city with a glimpse of the Eiffel Tower. Bed in the middle of room was interesting and very nice and the breakfast in bed while looking out the lovely windows was beautiful.
All amenities you could want. Brilliant service. Gino was especially engaging and even offered us a drink while we waited for our taxi.
All in all a very special weekend break.
Stay here. You won't regret it.
